author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lloyd Fonds: Investor Agreement Signed With DEWB, Changes To Supervisory Board
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Lloyd Fonds AG:
* DGAP-ADHOC: LLOYD FONDS AKTIENGESELLSCHAFT: INVESTOR AGREEMENT SIGNED WITH DEWB, CHANGES TO THE SUPERVISORY BOARD
* ‍DEWB IS TO ACQUIRE AROUND 25.6 PERCENT OF SHARES IN LFAG FROM AMA​
* ‍PARTIES HAVE AGREED NOT TO DISCLOSE PURCHASE PRICES​ * ALL MEMBERS OF SUPERVISORY BOARDS WITH EXCEPTION OF CHAIRMAN, EXPECTED BE STEPPING DOWN FROM LFAG Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
